title: Kanastra Raises $30 Million Series B from F-Prime to Spearhead Brazil's Private Credit infrastructure Development - Yahoo Finance
summary:
The new capital will be used to accelerate product development, deepen automation across the private credit funds lifecycle, and expand Kanastra's client base.
Private credit has become one of the fastest-growing sources of financing for companies in Brazil.
Over the last five years, private credit funds have grown by 230% as businesses increasingly turn to asset-backed facilities outside of traditional banks.
Kanastra is purpose-built to serve Brazil's rapidly expanding private credit market, which has become a critical source of financing for all sorts of companies through asset-backed facilities.
About Kanastra Kanastra is a Brazil-based fintech company providing end-to-end infrastructure solutions for the country's rapidly expanding private credit market.

title: Move Over State Street. JPMorgan Becomes Latest to File for Private Credit ETF - Yahoo Finance
summary:
This week, J.P. Morgan Asset Management got in line to be the next ETF issuer dabbling in private credit.
The firm filed Tuesday with the Securities and Exchange Commission for approval of its Total Credit ETF, a product that would allocate up to 15% of assets to private credit.
“An aggressive client portfolio currently contains between 5% to 10% private credit via [business development companies] for high yield,” he said.
The company’s filing did not include fees, though the SPDR SSGA IG Public & Private Credit ETF (PRIV) charges 0.7% and its second fund, State Street Short Duration IG Public & Private Credit ETF, which launched last month, charges 0.59%.
That’s not a verdict on the hotly anticipated category, but retail investors aren’t exactly piling into private credit ETFs yet.

title: Abacus Asset Group to Host Investor Summit on Longevity-Based Investments and Private Credit in Zurich, Switzerland with Global Virtual Access - Yahoo Finance
summary:
The Abacus Asset Group Investor Summit brings together distinguished financial professionals to explore how longevity-based financial planning has become foundational to modern asset management.
The convergence of demographic trends, technological innovation, and alternative asset management creates compelling opportunities for institutional investors seeking diversification and yield."
About Abacus Asset Group Abacus Asset Group is a specialized division of Abacus Global Management focusing on longevity-linked investments, secondary life insurance products, and lifespan-based financial solutions.
About Abacus Global Management, Inc. Abacus Global Management (NASDAQ: ABL) is a leading financial services company specializing in alternative asset management, data-driven wealth solutions, technology innovations, and institutional services.
Event Registration: Interested parties can register for the Abacus Asset Group Investor Summit by visiting the event registration portal or contacting events@abacusgm.com.
